post.name: Junior Research Fellow (JRF)
post.project_title: Real time non-contact pulse vibration measurement system of radial artery for vata, pitta, and kapha diagnosis using CMOS camera
post.salary: Rs. 31,000 + HRA for the first two years (as per SERB norms)
essential_qualification: Post-graduate Degree (ME/M.Tech) / Graduate (B.E/B.Tech) in Electrical Engineering / Electronics Engineering / Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering / Biomedical Engineering / Electrical and Electronics Engineering / Instrumentation Engineering

Selection through national eligibility tests (CSIR-UGC NET including lectureship and GATE) or national level examinations conducted by Central Govt. Departments and agencies (DST, DBT, DAE, DOS, DRDO, MHRD, ICAR, ICMR, IIT, IISC, IISER, etc.)
desirable_qualification: Knowledge in image processing and experimental fields related to the project

interview.mode: Hybrid (In-person at Dept. of Electrical Engineering, NIT Agartala and online)
interview.instructions: Candidates should appear with duly filled application form, original and attested copies of certificates, testimonials, bio-data, and 2 passport-size photographs.

terms_conditions: Position purely temporary; continuation subject to performance and annual review
Initial contract duration: 1 year; can be extended yearly up to 3 years
No TA/DA for attending the interview
Interested candidates may send filled applications in advance to Prof. Ardhendu Saha, PI via email: arsagtwave@gmail.com
Selected candidates may pursue PhD as per institute rules

content.undertaking: Candidate declares that the information provided is correct and understands that this is a contractual assignment on a purely temporary basis.
